trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONCRYSTALTOWER3_00000_CLOUDOFDARKNESS_000_000<tab>Who disturbs the gloom? Ahhh, mortals from the realm of light. You have not stumbled here without purpose...
TEXT_DUNGEONCRYSTALTOWER3_00000_CLOUDOFDARKNESS_000_010<tab>I am the Cloud of Darkness. What I do not smother, I devour. What I cannot devour, I destroy.
TEXT_DUNGEONCRYSTALTOWER3_00000_CLOUDOFDARKNESS_000_020<tab>The covenant is everlasting. All mortals before the flood of darkness will sink lifeless into the void!
